Hello guys,

Some of you are waiting for our next dedicated server offer.
We are still working on it and we hope that will please you.

In the mean time i would like to talk about our cloud vm platform.

Public cloud is the name of our vm plans based on SSD servers.

We use xen as hypervisor and cloudstack as backend.

You can use it as a reseller and make automated deployments thanks to API.

**Features**

-Deploy from template or ISO.

-Deploy in France, Miami or Singapore.

-Modify ressources allocation.

-Modify storage capacity.

-Setup client VPN or site to site VPN.

-Setup firewall / NAT / Load balancing.

-Manage your own templates.

-Create and manage sub user accounts.

**Plans**

-Hourly billing system.  
-Unmetered trafic.  
-If you subscribe to public cloud for the first time you can use the coupon code CP50CCP2015 while ordering (you have to put the code and apply it).

You will be able to spend 53.5$ in public cloud vm plans.
For example it will allow you to run the following vm for like 9 months.
If more ressources are needed please have a look at our other plans on https://express.ikoula.com/en/public-cloud

<>VM PICO 	Linux 5,70 $/mo 	512Mo	0,5vCPU 50Go SSD<>

**More**

You can run a ping from lg.ikoula.com

Ikoula is a french Hosting company since 1998.

We have our own french datacenter.

We also provides vm / dedicated servers / hosting services / mail services / managed services.

Thank you for reading and have a nice day.
